caption.p: Antifungal activity of Amomum nilgiricum leaf and rhizome extracts at 25, 50 and 100Â mg/mL ( a) Zone of inhibition from ethyl acetate leaf extract against Alternaria alternata ( b) methanol leaf extract against Alternaria alternata. ( c) Ethyl acetate leaf extract against Pyricularia oryzae. ( d) Methanolic rhizome extract against Pyricularia oryzae. PC: (Positive control) Nystatin; NC: Negative control (solvent).
